channel.title: Adding shops
channel.description:
Hi again umm i need some help i cant find any tuts or anything.
i want to add like 3 more npc's as shops but i cant figure out how i can trade them.
like NPC=70 the slayer master dude i want him to be a shop but i cant figure out where to go to trade him so i can see the shop.
i got to adding him into the Shops and all but idk where to go from their.
i got alot more questions too but this is 1 for now i forgot how to code cuz of my concussion Tongue.
Thanks for reading hope you guys or someone will reply to help me!!
